## Source: ossf-package-analysis (6f52fccc098ff9fe7c2f46b5653ed058f4f080380c5de5ab9943c413c30f1ee8)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'heft-example-plugin-02' @ 99.0.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
